    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        All players will begin with boolean isTurn as false,0 VP points,roadCount,and armyCount. They will start with 5 settlement, 4 cities and 15 roads.

      • Player

        public Player(int playerId,
              int userId,
              CatanColor color)
        Every player needs to be initiated with a playerId, userId and a color
        Parameters:
        playerId - We will get the player id for the order of who goes first and such
        userId - This is the id from the user that actually logged in
        color - The color assigned to the player

    • Method Detail
